descriptions.content: byis pa srung ba [TBRC T1027], bsrung ba dang za yig (footnote: Dung dkar tshig mdzod: “Putting into the mouth of a newborn infant a knot blessed with the mantra of the tutelary deity or a black piece of paper onto which a mantra has been written in gold for the sake of protecting [the infant] from harm by evil spirits and demons etc.”)
